Our Time need Founders

Weston Capital invests growth capital in the form of equity to be used to assist established ventures in expanding activity such as creating additional traction in Kenya, launching into Kenya and then foreign markets, as well as creating new products / services lines.

Success is not inevitable—the world needs determined and resilient people to make it happen.

We operate several funds that invest in young businesses and specialise in seed and ssed A and B seed funding. We like to get involved early. We provide vital funding primarily to companies we have worked with through our Accelerator Programme. That way, we get to know the people, technology, and business well before investing.

Our Approach is Different

Since 2013, we have continued to refine our value proposition and investment platform to create advantages for investors and founders that other VCs can’t replicate.

Weston Capital provides a continuous journey of support for entrepreneurs and social innovators, with the aim of creating and building sustainable businesses, that support job creation, help address social issues and build communities.

As part of this journey, these individuals and small businesses have access to funding, business skills development, tailored mentor-ship, and assistance with access to markets and finance. Our programmes are designed to help take our entrepreneurs from ideation to growth and beyond.

Our CSR programme also support businesses that primarily benefit women and youth, people in rural areas and persons with disabilities.
